name: Iron Dawn - An MMO Turn Based Strategy Game
blurb: A massively multiplayer strategy game strongly influenced by classics like Incubation, XCOM, Jagged Alliance and Fallout.

rewards.reward: No Reward
-------------------Supporter------------------- \r\nOur eternal gratitude and your name in the credits.

--------------------Backer-------------------- Game (digital copy), a special in-game weapon only available to Kickstarter backers, the title \u201cBacker\u201d which can be attached to your avatar name, a unique desktop wallpaper only available to backers, your name in the credits.

--------------------Tester-------------------- Beta-Access, one digital Kickstarter war bonds poster, digital copy of the book containing the English background story, title \u201cTester\u201d plus any title from lower tiers. - WHAT YOU GET FROM PREVIOUS TIERS \u2013 Game (digital copy),  special in-game weapon, desktop wallpaper, your name in the credits.

------------------Early Bird------------------ One DLC of your choice, early access to new features, soundtrack (digital), 2 digital posters, title \u201cEarly Bird\u201d plus any title from lower tiers. - WHAT YOU GET FROM PREVIOUS TIERS - Game (digital copy), special weapon, desktop wallpaper, your name in the credits, beta-access, digital background story book.

--------------------Boxer-------------------- Game (boxed), one printed poster, unique Kickstarter skin, dedicated desktop wallpaper, a button featuring the main character of a faction of your choice, the title \u201cBoxer\u201d plus any title from lower tiers. - WHAT YOU GET FROM PREVIOUS TIERS - Special weapon, your name in the credits, beta-access, background story book (digital), one DLC, early access to new features, soundtrack (digital), 2 digital posters.\r\n[[Please include \u00a32.5 for shipping in Germany and \u00a310 for international shipping.]]

-------------Special Agent------------- Orphelia Grant, a unique unit for the tabletop game G\u00f6tterd\u00e4mmerung, title \u201cSpecial Agent\u201d plus any title from lower tiers. - WHAT YOU GET FROM PREVIOUS TIERS \u2013 Game (boxed), special weapon, your name in the credits, beta-access, background story book (digital), 1 DLC, early access to new features, soundtrack (digital), 2 digital posters, 1 printed poster, unique Kickstarter skin, unique dedicated desktop wallpaper, a pin featuring the main character of a faction of your choice.\r\n[[Please include \u00a32.5 for shipping in Germany and \u00a310 for international shipping.]]

------------------Historian------------------ Background story book (printed), title \u201cHistorian\u201d plus any title from lower tiers. - WHAT YOU GET FROM PREVIOUS TIERS \u2013 Game (boxed), special weapon, your name in the credits, beta-access, 1 DLC, early access to new features, soundtrack (digital), 2 digital posters, 1 printed poster, unique Kickstarter skin, unique dedicated desktop wallpaper, pin.\r\n[[Please include \u00a32.5 for shipping in Germany and \u00a310 for international shipping.]]

----------------Special Officer---------------- A unique officer, 2 printed posters, 1 beta-key, all 3 digital Kickstarter posters, 2 pins, title \u201cSpecial Officer\u201d plus any title from lower tiers. - WHAT YOU GET FROM PREVIOUS TIERS \u2013 Game (boxed), special weapon, your name in the credits, beta-access, background story book (digital), 1 DLC, early access to new features, soundtrack (digital), unique Kickstarter skin, unique dedicated desktop wallpaper, Orphelia Grant.\r\n[[Please include \u00a32.5 for shipping in Germany and \u00a310 for international shipping.]]

All physical rewards will be signed and dedicated to you by the team. - WHAT YOU GET FROM PREVIOUS TIERS \u2013 Game (Collector\u2019s Edition box), your portrait in the game and as digital download, special in-game weapon, soundtrack CD, your name in the credits, beta-access, all 3 Kickstarter posters, all 3 digital Kickstarter posters, 1 DLC, early access to new features, unique Kickstarter skin, unique officer, unique dedicated desktop wallpaper.\r\n[[Please include \u00a32.5 for shipping in Germany and \u00a310 for international shipping.]]
